original_text: then the anger of the Lord will be kindled against you, and he will shut up the heavens, so that there will be no rain, and the land will yield no fruit, and you will perish quickly off the good land that the Lord is giving you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희에게 진노하사 하늘을 닫아 비를 내리지 아니하여 땅이 소산을 내지 않게 하시므로 너희가 여호와께서 주신 아름다운 땅에서 속히 멸망할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: then the anger of the Lord will be kindled against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주의 진노가 너희에게 타오를 것이요

sentences.original_text: and he will shut up the heavens
so that there will be no rain
and the land will yield no fruit
off the good land that the Lord is giving you
sentences.korean_translation: 주가 너희에게 주시는 그 좋은 땅에서
